nodes.text: The Kol Huro system was a factory system ruled by the tyrant Mustag Olus. Influenced by the Dark Lord of the Sith, Darth Sidious, Olus devoted all seven planets in the system to developing and manufacturing starships and weapons, such as the Kol Huro combat droid. The tyrant was defeated by the Jedi Order on behalf of the Galactic Republic in 44 BBY.
The system was conquered by the Yuuzhan Vong during their invasion of the galaxy.
